{{Quote|Joby, to the stables.|[[Lord Commander]] [[Jeor Mormont]]|You Win or You Die}}
'''Joby''' is an unidentified background character in the [[Season 1|first season]]. He is a newly made Steward of the [[Night's Watch]], of the same group of recruits as [[Jon Snow]]. Joby is assigned to the stables, it is assumed that he is the person who readies the horses for the rangers.Â
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there's no member of the Night's Watch called Joby.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
Joby is present during the speech Lord Commander [[Jeor Mormont]] gave to the "graduating" recruits. Joby is assigned to the stables.<ref>"[[You Win or You Die]]"</ref>
